### About me

I am student of [Economics undergraduate at Universidad de Los Andes](https://economia.uniandes.edu.co/programas/pregrado-en-economia). In my work, I constantly use programming languages such as Statistical programming in [R](https://www.r-project.org/) and [Stata](https://www.stata.com/).

### Research interests
My primary interests are Macroeconomics, International Economics, and Monetary Policy. I am also interested in Statistical Programming, Big Data, and Applied Mathematics.

<br>

You can find my [CV here](https://philipramirezp.github.io/cv/CV_PhilipRamirez.pdf)

<br>

If you want to talk to me you can make an appointment [here](https://calendly.com/philipramirezp).
